content.raw:
I just switched back to the old version of ignition-math4 formula and it doesn't have this problem. It has the following in its generated cmake_install.cmake:

~~~
if("${CMAKE_INSTALL_COMPONENT}" STREQUAL "headers" OR NOT CMAKE_INSTALL_COMPONENT) 
  file(INSTALL DESTINATION "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/include/ignition/common0/ignition/common" TYPE FILE FILES "/Users/jenkins/Desktop/ign-common/build/include/ignition/common/config.hh") 
endif() 
~~~

So my attempt to fix the ignition-msgs1 build with ignition-cmake broke the existing ignition-common build. I'll probably revert the ignition-math4 formula change for now.
